get.description: Get a list of recent media objects from a given location. May return a mix of both image and video types.n                n            nn            n            n                Parametersn                n                    n                    n                        min_timestampn                        Return media after this UNIX timestampn                    n                    n                    n                        min_idn                        Return media before this min_id.n                    n                    n                    n                        max_idn                        Return media after this max_id.n                    n                    n                    n                        max_timestampn                        Return media before this UNIX timestamp

parameters.name: max_timestamp
parameters.description: Return media before this UNIX timestamp

parameters.name: min_timestamp
parameters.description: Return media after this UNIX timestamp

get.description: Search for a location by geographic coordinate.n                n            nn            n            n                Parametersn                n                    n                    n                        distancen                        Default is 1000m (distance=1000), max distance is 5000.n                    n                    n                    n                        facebook_places_idn                        Returns a location mapped off of a Facebook places id. If used, a Foursquare id and lat, lng are not required.n                    n                    n                    n                        foursquare_idn                        Returns a location mapped off of a foursquare v1 api location id. If used, you are not required to use lat and lng. Note that this method is deprecated; you should use the new foursquare IDs with V2 of their API.n                    n                    n                    n                        latn                        Latitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lng is required.n                    n                    n                    n                        lngn                        Longitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lat is required.n                    n                    n                    n                        foursquare_v2_idn                        Returns a location mapped off of a foursquare v2 api location id. If used, you are not required to use lat and lng.

parameters.name: facebook_places_id
parameters.description: Returns a location mapped off of a Facebook places id. If used, a Foursquare id and lat, lng are not required.

parameters.name: foursquare_id
parameters.description: Returns a location mapped off of a foursquare v1 api location id. If used, you are not required to use lat and lng. Note that this method is deprecated; you should use the new foursquare IDs with V2 of their API.

parameters.name: foursquare_v2_id
parameters.description: Returns a location mapped off of a foursquare v2 api location id. If used, you are not required to use lat and lng.

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lng is required.

parameters.name: lng
parameters.description: Longitude of the center search coordinate. If used, lat is required.

get.description: Get a list of recent media objects from a given location. May return a mix of both image and video types.n                n            nn            n            n                Parametersn                n                    n                    n                        min_timestampn                        Return media after this UNIX timestampn                    n                    n                    n                        min_idn                        Return media before this min_id.n                    n                    n                    n                        max_idn                        Return media after this max_id.n                    n                    n                    n                        max_timestampn                        Return media before this UNIX timestamp

parameters.name: max_timestamp
parameters.description: Return media before this UNIX timestamp

parameters.name: min_timestamp
parameters.description: Return media after this UNIX timestamp
